content:
Hi all,
We created Implementation Guides using stu3 version. But we want to convert them to current version.Can anyone suggest me?

are you asking how to:

  • update your artifacts to R4?
  • update the ig-publisher to R4?
@Eric Haas We created our profiles in R3 using Forge Tool but now we need to convert them to R4. Is there any way?

there's 2 different things that you might mean:

  • convert the profile format from R3 to R4
  • change the profiles so that they are profiles of the R4 types instead of the R3 types
Thank you @Grahame Grieve Are there any convertors to convert from R3 to R4
the is done automatically by the tool
the second - you have to do manually
